The circuit was initially in a steady state.
The switch S was opened at t = 1.0 × 10⁻³ s.
The current I(t) decreased exponentially after the switch was opened.
The resistance R_L of the coil L can be calculated using the formula R_L = R_total - R.
The total resistance R_total = R + R_L.
The resistance R_L can be found from the slope of the curve in the graph.
